text: "Tell Her About It" is a 1983 song by Billy Joel. It is the leading single from his ninth studio album An Innocent Man. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Ireland, number 3 in South Africa, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in Canada, number 9 in Australia and number 12 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== ===12-inch maxi single=== ====Side A==== #"Tell Her About It" - 3:35 ====Side B==== #"Easy Money" - 4:02 #"Keeping the Faith" - 4:40 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Soul songs
title: Tell Her About It
